overview: Grant Yonehiro has served as CEO and President since the launch of the new venture. Prior to this position, Mr. Yonehiro was CBO and SVP of development programs for Maxygen. Grant Yonehiro first joined Maxygen in May 2003 as Vice President of Business Development, then served as Senior Vice President of Global Business Development and Managing Director of U.S. Operations beginning in January 2006 before being promoted to Chief Business Officer and Senior Vice President Development Programs in March 2008. From 1996 to 2003, Mr. Yonehiro held various senior management positions at GenVec, a biopharmaceutical company, including Vice President of Product Management, Drug Development Vice President, and Vice President of Commercial Operations. Prior to GenVec, he worked in business development at Cell Genesys, in investment banking at Piper Jaffray and in the Technology Transfer Office at Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory. He graduated Magna Cum Laude from the University of Minnesota with a Bachelor of Individualized Studies and received his M.B.A. from the Haas School of Business at UC Berkeley.
